SELECT PHOTO_SEQ as "seq", PHOTO_SORT as "sort", PHOTO_IMAGE as "image", PHOTO_SNAPSHT as "snapsht", PHOTO_NAME as "name", PHOTO_DESC as "desc", PHOTO_LOC as "location", PHOTO_DATE as "date", PHOTO_TAG as "tag", PHOTO_DEVICE as "device", PHOTO_LIKE as "like" FROM TB_PTPOLIO_PHOTOS WHERE PHOTO_SEQ = #{seq}
